description.text:
Each time you die, you will have a price to pay using Obols.
When you don't have enough Obols, you will enter into debt until repaid.

If you die while in debt, it will wipe your inventory. (see options) 

Breaking spawners will increase by 1 your Obols.
It also gives you back one of your lost items. 

You can store up to 3(2 in Ordeal) times the amount of Obols required.
